title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson’s Stock of the Day for May 22
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson’s Stock of the Day for May 22
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Forterra Inc. began last week by releasing first-quarter results, and the stock has been falling ever since. The maker of concrete pipe and building products has stretched its post-report loss to six days. It's down as much as 48 percent from the price of an initial public offering last October.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
